text: �and He will give you a twofold portion of His mercy�He said:That is, the ⸢secret of⸣ mercy (⸢sirr⸣al-raḥma), and the essence of mercy (ʿayn al-raḥma). [Its] secret is the secret of gnosis (sirr al-maʿrifa). [Its] essence is the essence of obedience to God and His Messenger.His words, Exalted is He:
